title: Carlos Kenig - Wikipedia
snippet: Carlos Eduardo Kenig (born November 25, 1953) is an Argentine-American mathematician and Louis Block Distinguished Service Professor in the Department of Mathematics at the University of Chicago. He is known for his work in harmonic analysis and partial differential equations.

title: Carlos E. Kenig – NAS
snippet: Carlos Kenig is the Louis Block Distinguished Service Professor in the Department of Mathematics at the University of Chicago. Kenig is recognized for his applications of tools and techniques of harmonic analysis to a number of different areas ...

title: Carlos Kenig - The Mathematics Genealogy Project
snippet: According to our current on-line database, Carlos Kenig has 25 students and 59 descendants.
